ygData.subject: Re: The Battle Ends, and the Carnage Begins
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry if I mix things up, but I have to type this before the bell rings, and its just about to. I ll post with the rest of my chars later. ... Prowl slows down

Sorry if I mix things up, but I have to type this before the bell 
rings, and its just about to.

I'll post with the rest of my chars later.

::Prowl/FZ/Lavacons/Perndabot/Repressor/Kluster::

Prowl slows down about 20 miles away from the Cybertronian Fire, going 
less than 100mph now. He kisses Iron Raptor.

-Be careful, love. These new bodies don't make us invincible,- Prowl 
says while swooping down toward the ground and dropping Iron Raptor 
off. They were now several hundred yards away from the Cybertronian 
Fire. -And if you need help, just think to me, I'll be there for you.-

Picking a target, Prowl straightens his wings, flying at FZ, who he 
thought was Zardus.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ smiles, looking at the Cybertronian Fire as shots penetrate the 
shield. The Maximals didn't look like they stood much of a chance 
anymore.

"Hey, Zardus!"

FZ spins around in time to see several oncoming laser shots, which 
send him flying backwards when they hit. FZ growls, his jetpack 
sending him upward and avoiding Prowl as the Maximal flies by.

"You'll pay for that, Maximal," FZ growls to Prowl, firing a glowing 
missile at the Maximal. Prowl turns to avoid it, the missile turning 
to follow him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa yelps in surprise as several shots hit her in the back. She 
spins around, pointing her missile launcher at Klant and firing two 
missiles.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral watches the explosion from the Cybertronian Fire with a smile, 
knowing that he was part of the force that had brought the shields 
down low enough to allow for that explosion. Deciding to kill a few 
bots, he aims at Torca, firing several laser shots and ducking under 
autogun fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox flies into the air, firing off two dozen laser bolts at Ratchet.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight takes out her tranquilizer gun, firing three darts at Orion.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Griplash takes out his missile launcher, aiming at Hot Rod but then 
hearing Unitron's yell. He really didn't wanna piss that bot off.

Griplash aims and fires at Angel Prime instead.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing Prowl enter the battle, Perndabot smiles and powers his 
jetpack, flying up toward the Maximal.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor launches himself into the air, an EMP shot disabling his 
left leg. He fires off two missiles at the Cybertronian Fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster ducks under some stray shots, firing at Manterror with his 
he
